title: MPH: Aston Martin's moment of truth. Why F1 masterplan will flourish or flop at Imola
summary: After losing its way last year, Aston Martin's F1 team has been reshaping itself into a force that can fight for world championships. This weekend's Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix is where it must start to deliver, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which F1 team is focusing on reshaping itself to compete for world championships in the current season?
What significant event is Aston Martin looking to prove its performance at?
What was Aston Martin's status in the previous season before their restructuring?
wrong_options: They finished in the top three
